verses.1: Kei pen Sharon gam sunga a om gamlak pak, mualkuam sunga a om unok pak bang ka hi lel hi.
verses.2: Tua bang hi lo a, ka ngaihno pen numei khempeuh lak panin ling lak a a om unok pak tawh kibang hi.
verses.3: Ka ngaihno tangval dang tawh teh lehang gamlak singkung lak a a om epel kung tawh kibang hi. Ama liim ah ka tu nuam a, a gahte lim ka sa hi.
verses.4: Annekna phualah hong paipih inla, itna mai tawh hong en in.
verses.5: Lungzuang, duangvul ka hih manin leenggahkeu tawh hong vak inla, epel gah tawh hong thadimsak in.
verses.6: A veilam baan hong khamsak a, a taklam khutin kei hong kawi hi.
verses.7: Jerusalem nungakte aw, koʼ kingaihna nong suknawi loh nadingun sakhi le sanang tawh kei tungah hong kiciam un.
verses.8: Ka ngaihnoʼ awging ka za hi. Mual tung tawnin hong tai a, mualte kantanin kei hong zuan hi.
verses.9: Ka ngaihno sanang tawh kibang a, sakhital no tawh zong a kibang hi. Ka inn pualam uh ah dinga, tawlet ah hong dak zialin kawmvang panin hong en giau hi.
verses.10: Ka ngaihno in ka kiangah thu hong gen a, “Hong pai in, ngaihno aw, hong zui in, itluat aw.
verses.11: Phalbi veng ta a, guah zu nawn lo hi.
verses.12: Gam sung tengah paakte palh a, la sak hun tung ta hi. Gam sung tengah vakhu hamte kiza ta hi.
verses.13: Theite zong min ta a, leenggah pak gim namtui zong kiza ta hi. Hong pai in, ngaihno aw, hong zui in, itluat aw.
verses.14: Suangheeng kawm a vasa bangin nang na bu niloh hi. A ngaihbaang na mai hong musak inla, a lungzuan huai na awging hong zasak in.
verses.15: “I leengguite pak ta ahih manin ngia no hon in a suksiat ma-in tua ngia no honte man ni,” hong ci hi.
verses.16: Ka ngaihno keima aʼ hi; kei zong ama aʼ hiʼng. Amah in unok paakte lakah a tuu cing a,
verses.17: nitak huih vot mateng nitak ni tum mateng a cing hi. Sanang bangin mual tunga sakhital no bangin itluat aw, hong paikik in.
